Posts.Content:
Hi...Cindy Lee if you read this post I was just wondering what you did over those 2 years u waited...did u get anymore follow-up mammos or any other testing? Were any of the microcalc. grouped together? How did u finally discover the cancer? Thanx..just curious about
 your situation thats all. Take care....
Posts.Title: Microcalcifications-should I wait for a biopsy?
Microcalcifications-should I wait for a biopsy?

Posts.Content: Thanks for your reply...4 of the 6 months have already passed but I am scheduled to see a surgeon due to my enlarged nodes on 1-28...my 44th B-Day...yikes.....doubt if he is a bc specialist but better than no one. After reading up I do feel an urgency because it does seem that alot if not most people with grouped calcifications are getting biopsied and not waiting. Not sure why I was put on the 6 month follow-up. Guess they weren't quite suspicious enough. Did you have any obvious lymph node involvement ??
Posts.Title: Microcalcifications-should I wait for a biopsy?
